Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 27th overall pick, by Baltimore in 1983...
Injured on 4/28/1983 with a Broken Foot, out for 5-6 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/2/1988, off Gary Wayne (NYY)...

Won Player of the Week award on 9/15/1989, hitting .522 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
